 [<span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎סוּף‎</span>] **verb** ==come to an end, cease== ([[BDB#Tg|ᵑ7]], <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎סוּף‎</span> Syriac (<img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,">) <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,">, ***cease, stop*** (often), [[BDB#Tg|ᵑ7]] <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎סוֺפָא‎</span>, Syriac <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,">, Late Hebrew <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎סוֺף‎</span> ***end***); — 

**Qal** ***Perfect*** 3 plural <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎סָ֑פוּ‎</span> [[Ps.73.19|Ps 73:19]], <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎וְסָפ֫וּ‎</span> consecutive [[Amos.3.15|Amos 3:15]] ***Imperfect*** 3 masculine singular <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎יֶסוּף‎</span> [[Esth.9.28|Esth 9:28]] 3 masculine plural <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎יָסֻ֫פוּ‎</span> [[Isa.66.17|Isa 66:17]] — ***come to an end*** [[Amos.3.15|Amos 3:15]]; [[Isa.66.17|Isa 66:17]]; [[Ps.73.19|Ps 73:19]] (+ <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎תַּמּוּ‎</span>), <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎וְזִכְרָם לֹאיָֿסוּף‎</span> <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מִזַּרְעָם‎</span> [[Esth.9.28|Esth 9:28]]. **Hiph\`il** ***make an end of***, only (if text correct) ***Imperfect*** 1 singular (+Infinitive absolute <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎אָסֹף‎</span>, chosen for assonance, see  <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎אסף‎</span>), cohortative = jussive In form, <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎אָסֹף אָסֵף‎</span> [[Zeph.1.2|Zeph 1:2]], <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎אָסֵף‎</span> v[[Zeph.1.3|Zeph 1:3]] v[[Zeph.1.3|Zeph 1:3]], <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎אָסֹף אֲסִיפֵם‎</span> [[Jer.8.13|Jer 8:13]] (on these forms see [[BDB#Gf|Gf]] [[BDB#Bö|Bö]]<sup>§ 988, 1</sup> [[BDB#Kö|Kö]]<sup>i.445, 466</sup>); but read perhaps, for <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎אָסֵף‎</span>, <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎אֶאֱסֹף‎</span>, [[BDB#We|We]] [[BDB#Buhl|Buhl]]<sup>Lex 13</sup>, or <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎אֹסֵף‎</span>, [[BDB#Ges|Ges]]<sup>«GKC:72aa»§§ 72aa</sup>, «GKC:113w»113w n.3 [[BDB#Now|Now]]<sup>[[Zeph.1.2|Zeph 1:2]]</sup>, and in Jeremiah <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎אָסֹף אֹסְפֵם‎</span> [[BDB#Ges|Ges]]<sup>l.c.</sup> (against [[BDB#Gie|Gie]] see [[BDB#Hi|Hi]]).
